Improvements.Description: There are a few instances where the same code is repeated multiple times. For example, getting the browser version and getting the inner window width. These can be extracted into their own methods to make the code more DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself).

Improvements.Improvement: Use a switch statement instead of if-else statements
Improvements.Description: The if-else statements checking the type of the element can be converted into a switch statement. This would make the code more readable and easier to manage.
